document.masterDocTitle: Geometridae (Lepidoptera) of the Baikal region: keys to species and an annotated catalogue. Part 1. Ennominae

Belova, 1988: 21 ; 2000a: 111 ; 2000b: 27 ; 2008: 46 ; 2009: 178 ; 2010: 22 ; Rudykh & Gordeeva, 1997: 64.

Distribution. Transeurasiatic, temperate. From Kaliningradskaya Oblast to the southern part of Khabarovsky Kray, except the Extreme North, Sakhalin , S Kurils. Outside Russia in Europe, N and E Kazakhstan , Mongolia , NE and N China , Korea , Japan ( Hokkaido , Honshu, Shikoku isl.).
Hostplants: different deciduous and coniferous trees and shrubs ( Beljaev 2016 ).
